Mailing Address: PO Box 22001Capri Post OfficeKelowna, BC     V1Y 9N9
Service Details: - Turns backyard fruit trees into a valuable source of food for the community by harvesting otherwise wasted fruit- Increases the availability of healthy fruit for those in need, reduces food waste, and promotes local food security and volunteerism- Home owners can sign-up to have their excess fruit picked by volunteers to be distributed among tree owners, volunteer pickers, and local community organizations- Volunteer opportunities available
Eligibility: All ages, backgrounds, skills, and abilities welcome!
